reviews.review_msg: Theory class with her was brutal. Although she is very intelligent and passionate, it was very hard to learn from her. Horrible lecturing style, hard-to-follow PowerPoint presentations, and very unclear grading criteria. She does not use Canvas. Definitely not accommodating to neurodivergent students either. Kind of rude/arrogant to students.

Incredible professor. She is very knowledgeable and although she will incorporate areas of her research into the class it is very informative. I have never learnt so much in one class. She is always willing to help with assignments and will help you understand things if you ask for help outside of class.

It's supposed to be soc, but you will get a political science/economics course. Her essay feedback is rude and unhelpful. She doesn't actually teach anything. Everyone in the course was really confused. Some cried! She dismisses you if you don't agree with her. She only has good ratings because she is a nice person, but she is not a good teacher.
